entry.title: JET 126 - 1-1/2 X 1/4 Inch Shaft Mounted Crimped Radial End Brush 550905
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Shaft Mounted Brushes
Price: 9.65

[shortdesc]

1-1/2 x 1/4 Inch Shaft Mounted Crimped Radial Brush

  • Made from high quality crimped wire for increased life and performance
  • Mounted on 1/4" shafts, these brushes are suitable for use on drills and/or die grinders
  • Ideal for general surface cleaning rust, scale and paint removal
  • Excellent for cleaning valve seats in cylinder blocks and carbon deposits
  • Can also be used on aluminum and other non-ferrous metals
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Diameter 1-1/2 Inch
    Product Type Shaft Mounted Brushes

    Extra Product Information

  • Ideal for general surface cleaning rust, scale and paint removal
  • Can also be used on aluminum and other non-ferrous metals

    • Product Information

  • Type: Crimped Radial
  • Wire Diameter : .008 Inch
  • Max
  • Speed : 20,000 RPM

entry.title: JET EK1 200 - 1-1/8 X 1/4 Inch Shaft Mounted Knot Twisted End Brush 553701
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Shaft Mounted Brushes
Price: 26.26

[shortdesc]

1-1/8 x 1/4 Inch Shaft Mounted Knot Twisted End Brush

  • Mounted on 1/4" shafts, these brushes are suitable for use on drills and/or die grinders
  • Always ensure that the RPM rating of the tool used is not greater than the RPM rating of the brush used
  • Ideal for heavy duty jobs such as heavy bur and scale removal, cleaning rust, castings and paint around studs and bolts
  • Knot twisted brushes are available in end, cup and radial styles
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Diameter 1-1/8 Inch
    Product Type Shaft Mounted Brushes
